articles.author: Brian Fung, CNN
articles.title: Apple will be required to support USB-C charger under new EU policy - CNN
articles.description: Apple and other smartphone makers will be required to support USB-C as part of a single charging standard for mobile devices across the European Union by as early as the fall of 2024 under a new law announced Tuesday by EU officials.
articles.content: Washington (CNN Business)Apple and other smartphone makers will be required to support USB-C as part of a single charging standard for mobile devices across the European Union by as early as the fall… [+2396 chars]

articles.title: EU agrees single mobile charging port in blow to Apple - CTV News
articles.description: Apple will have to change the connector on iPhones sold in Europe by 2024 after EU countries and lawmakers agreed on Tuesday to a single mobile charging port for mobile phones, tablets and cameras in a world first.
articles.content:

articles.author: Loni Prinsloo
articles.title: Govt ‘taken aback’ by Ryanair’s Afrikaans quiz policy - News24
articles.description: South Africa’s government said it’s “taken aback” by European low-cost airline Ryanair’s decision to force an Afrikaans test on travellers to prevent the use of fraudulent passports.
